newsitem.title: JAPAN: Square says orders for new game title hits 1.5 mln.
newsitem.headline: Square says orders for new game title hits 1.5 mln.

text.p: Square Co Ltd said on Thursday that orders for its Final Fantasy VII game software at convenience stores reached 1.5 million units as of January 25 and that it has stopped taking orders.
The game title is scheduled to be launched on January 31.
Square's marketing subsidiary, Digicube Co Ltd, began accepting orders at five convenience store chains in Japan on December 1, 1996.
The new title is only compatible with Sony Computer Entertainment's PlayStation game machine.
